metadata.title: CVE-2015-0856 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
daemon/Greeter.cpp in sddm before 0.13.0 does not properly disable the KDEcrash handler, which allows local users to gain privileges by crashing agreeter when using certain themes, as demonstrated by the plasma-workspacebreeze theme.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0856` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sddm - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
sddm-theme-debian-elarun - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
sddm-theme-debian-maui - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
sddm-theme-elarun - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
sddm-theme-maldives - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
sddm-theme-maui - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sddm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.13.0-1ubuntu5').
